verses.verse: Lord <WH3068>, I cry <WH7121> unto you <WH2363>: make haste unto me <WH238>; give ear unto my voice <WH6963>, when I cry unto you <WH7121>.
Let my prayer <WH8605> be set forth <WH3559> before <WH6440> you as incense <WH7004>; and the lifting up <WH4864> of my hands <WH3709> as the evening <WH6153> sacrifice <WH4503>.
Set <WH7896> a watch <WH8108>, O Lord <WH3068>, before my mouth <WH6310>; keep <WH5341> the door <WH1817> of my lips <WH8193>.

Incline <WH5186> not my heart <WH3820> to any evil <WH7451> thing <WH1697>, to practice <WH5953> wicked <WH7562> works <WH5949> with men <WH376> that work <WH6466> iniquity <WH205>: and let me not eat <WH3898> of their dainties <WH4516>.

Let the righteous <WH6662> strike <WH1986> me <WH2617>; it shall be a kindness: and let him reprove <WH3198> me <WH7218>; it shall be a excellent oil <WH8081>, which shall not break <WH5106> my head <WH7218>: for yet my prayer <WH8605> also shall be in their calamities <WH7451>.
When their judges <WH8199> are overthrown <WH8058> in stony <WH5553> places <WH3027>, they shall hear <WH8085> my words <WH561>; for they are sweet <WH5276>.
Our bones <WH6106> are scattered <WH6340> at the grave <WH7585>'s mouth <WH6310>, as when one cuts <WH6398> and cleaves <WH1234> wood upon the earth <WH776>.
But my eyes <WH5869> are on you <WH3069>, O God the Lord <WH136>: in you is my trust <WH2620>; leave <WH6168> not my soul <WH5315> destitute <WH6168>.
Keep <WH8104> me from the snares <WH3027> which they have laid <WH3369> for me <WH4170>, and the traps of the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205>.
Let the wicked <WH7563> fall <WH5307> into their own nets <WH4364>, while I likewise <WH3162> escape <WH5674>.
